_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY covered call: long 100 shares + short 620C Apr expiry
rationale: Income on existing SPY position, willing to sell at 620

entry_conditions.notes: Covered call: own 100 shares + sell OTM call. Income strategy on existing holdings. Enter when mildly bullish or neutral â€” willing to sell at strike if assigned. Higher IV = more premium. Pick strikes above resistance for comfort.

pnl_drivers.max_loss: Stock cost basis - call premium (if stock goes to zero)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Call premium income â€” theta decay of short call
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Stock appreciation up to strike price

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” short call decays, providing income
greeks_profile.vega: negative â€” short call benefits from IV decrease
greeks_profile.delta: positive (long stock ~100 delta, short call reduces by ~-30 delta = ~70 net)
greeks_profile.gamma: slightly negative â€” short call gamma reduces delta if stock rises

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Stock rises to just below strike at expiry. Keep shares + collect full call premium. Roll to next month.
